_header: Of Mary Magdalene may men take
Title(s): De sancta Maria Magdalena historia; Northern Homily Cycle
Subjects: Mary Magdalene, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: ‘De sancta Maria Magdalena historia’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Of Mari maudelayn mai men takeensaumple sins forto forsake…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Vnto his kingdom he vs kenthurgh prayer of Maudlayn Amen
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: De sancta Maria Magdalena historia (rubric, f. 157ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 81-92.
